title: Psycho-Pass: Sinners Of The System Case 3 - Beyond Love And Hate
alternative_title: PP Case 3, サイコパス Sinners of the system, Case 3 Onshuno kanatani
status: PP Case 3, サイコパス Sinners of the system, Case 3 Onshuno kanatani
description:
Description :
        "Can you become my teacher?"

After the case occurred in 2116 in the Southeast Asian Union, the SEAUn, Kougami Shinya kept on wandering.
In a small country in South Asia, Kougami rescues a bus carrying refugees that were being attacked by armed guerrillas.
Among them, there is a girl named Tenzing.
Tenzing begs Kougami to teach her how to fight to take revenge.
What is the aspect of this world that a girl who seeks for revenge and a man who could accomplish his revenge can see at the margin of a world without a way out…?
